title: Let’s Try Making it by Hand!
detail_text: <:th_ch0105/>Do you think it’s been long enough, Riko-chan? Is it ready?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>It’s been in the fridge for a pretty long time, let me check on it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>...How does it look? Is it done?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Yeah, it’s solidified! You-chan, have a taste! Here, say “ahhh”...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Ahhh… Wow, it’s good!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Yay! The homemade ice cream turned out great!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Let’s call the others and eat it together~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Ah, in that case, why don’t we add some canned fruits for decoration?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Hehe, you put lots of mikan in, huh♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>I hope everyone will like it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
